actions.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A resolution expressing the support of the House of Representatives for the President as he prepares to meet with Soviet General Secretary Gorbachev in Geneva, Switzerland, and expressing its hope that this summit meeting will provide a basis for a freer, more stable, and more peaceful world.

summary.text: Declares that the House of Representatives offers its support for the President as he prepares to meet with Soviet General Secretary Gorbachev (at the Geneva Summit), and expresses its hope that this summit will provide for a more peaceful world.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the support of the House of Representatives for the President as he prepares to meet with Soviet General Secretary Gorbachev in Geneva, Switzerland, and expressing its hope that this summit meeting will provide a basis for a freer, more stable, and more peaceful world.
